INSERT INTO peer_records ( address, port, torrent_id, downloader, peer_id, client_name, uploaded, uploaded_offset, upload_speed, downloaded, downloaded_offset, download_speed, last_flags, first_time_seen, last_time_seen, peer_geoip ) VALUES ( #{e.address}, #{e.port}, #{e.torrentId}, #{e.downloader}, #{e.peerId}, #{e.clientName}, #{e.uploaded}, #{e.uploadedOffset}, #{e.uploadSpeed}, #{e.downloaded}, #{e.downloadedOffset}, #{e.downloadSpeed}, #{e.lastFlags}, #{e.firstTimeSeen}, #{e.lastTimeSeen}, #{e.peerGeoIp, typeHandler=com.ghostchu.peerbanhelper.databasent.driver.common.JsonTypeHandlerForwarder} ) ON CONFLICT (address, torrent_id, downloader) DO UPDATE SET
uploaded = CASE WHEN #{e.lastTimeSeen} < peer_records.last_time_seen THEN peer_records.uploaded WHEN (#{e.uploaded} - peer_records.uploaded_offset) < 0 THEN peer_records.uploaded + #{e.uploaded} ELSE peer_records.uploaded + #{e.uploaded} - peer_records.uploaded_offset END,
downloaded = CASE WHEN #{e.lastTimeSeen} < peer_records.last_time_seen THEN peer_records.downloaded WHEN (#{e.downloaded} - peer_records.downloaded_offset) < 0 THEN peer_records.downloaded + #{e.downloaded} ELSE peer_records.downloaded + #{e.downloaded} - peer_records.downloaded_offset END,
uploaded_offset = CASE WHEN #{e.lastTimeSeen} < peer_records.last_time_seen THEN peer_records.uploaded_offset ELSE #{e.uploaded} END,
downloaded_offset = CASE WHEN #{e.lastTimeSeen} < peer_records.last_time_seen THEN peer_records.downloaded_offset ELSE #{e.downloaded} END,
upload_speed = CASE WHEN #{e.lastTimeSeen} < peer_records.last_time_seen THEN peer_records.upload_speed ELSE #{e.uploadSpeed} END,
download_speed = CASE WHEN #{e.lastTimeSeen} < peer_records.last_time_seen THEN peer_records.download_speed ELSE #{e.downloadSpeed} END,
peer_id = CASE WHEN #{e.lastTimeSeen} < peer_records.last_time_seen THEN peer_records.peer_id ELSE #{e.peerId} END,
client_name = CASE WHEN #{e.lastTimeSeen} < peer_records.last_time_seen THEN peer_records.client_name ELSE #{e.clientName} END,
last_flags = CASE WHEN #{e.lastTimeSeen} < peer_records.last_time_seen THEN peer_records.last_flags ELSE #{e.lastFlags} END,
last_time_seen = CASE WHEN #{e.lastTimeSeen} < peer_records.last_time_seen THEN peer_records.last_time_seen ELSE #{e.lastTimeSeen} END;
